alert.note: Alert for Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 8:02PM CDT until April 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN CHEROKEE...EASTERN WOODBURY...BUENA VISTA AND IDA COUNTIES... At 802 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sioux Rapids to near Danbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 7:21 pm CDT a 58 mph wind gust was reported 5 SW of Anthon, Iowa. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Storm Lake, Cherokee, Ida Grove, Alta, Holstein, Aurelia, Newell, Correctionville, Sioux Rapids, Battle Creek, Albert City, Lakeside, Anthon, Galva, Danbury, Quimby, Washta, Marathon, Smithland and Cushing. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
